text: Preußenlied (Translated from German as: Song of Prussia) was the National Anthem of the Kingdom of Prussia from 1830-1840, also known as "Ich bin ein Preuße, kennt ihr meine Farben?".Lilian Dalbiac. Dictionary of Quotations (German). Swan Sonnenschein. New York. 1906. p. 196. == Lyrics == == References == == Other websites == *Preußenlied at Preußen-chronik.de (in German) *Preußenlied at Ingeb.org (in German) *Sheet music Category:Prussia Category:Historical anthems Category:German anthems
title: Preußenlied
